Detailed Description

IPIPE GIC Configuration.

struct vpsissIpipeGicConfig

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissIpipeGicConfig::enable

Flag to enable/disable GIC module

uint32_t vpsissIpipeGicConfig::enableLscGain

Enables/Disables LSC Gain to the threshold values

uint32_t vpsissIpipeGicConfig::gain

GIC Gain Value In Simple Averaging method, input pixel is mixed with the surrounding pixels with this gain value. In Adaptive method, this is used as a gain

uint32_t vpsissIpipeGicConfig::nfGain

NF Gain, used in calculating the threshold when thrSel is set to VPS_ISS_IPIPE_GIC_THR_SEL_NF2

uint32_t vpsissIpipeGicConfig::slope

Slope used in calculating four thresholds (used for doing weighted average of current and surrounding four pixels) when thrSel is set to VPS_ISS_IPIPE_GIC_THR_SEL_GIC_REG

uint32_t vpsissIpipeGicConfig::threshold

Threshold used in calculating four thresholds when thrSel is set to VPS_ISS_IPIPE_GIC_THR_SEL_GIC_REG

vpsissIpipeGicThresholdSel_t vpsissIpipeGicConfig::thrSel

Threshold Selection

vpsissIpipeGicAlgoType_t vpsissIpipeGicConfig::type

Algorithm Type
